titleStmt.title: Proposals for raising money for the National Land-Bank
titleStmt.author: Briscoe, John, fl. 1695.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

Included on p. [2]: An account of the value of the estates in the several counties subscribed towards the fund for a National Land-Bank from Thursday the 11th of June, to Saturday the 17th of August, 1695.
